comment._content: For an updated history, including recent developments such as Toronto's City Airport is now Billy Bishop Toronto City Airport, see: www.thecanadianencyclopedia.com/index.cfm?PgNm=TCE&Pa... en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Billy_Bishop

comment.author: 62508825@N00
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Billy_Bishop The Victoria Cross flight www.billybishop.org/page.php?page=victoriacross Bishop vs The Red Baron www.billybishop.org/page.php?page=victoriacross British Pathe video newsreel film Air Marshal 'Billy' Bishop VC and Director of Canadian Air Force Recruiting. He is talking to Canadian pilots at an English fighter station c1942. www.britishpathe.com/record.php?id=51820 Grave www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=10460
